This includes identifying temporal elements (e.g., duration, frequency, response time, triggers, timeout, stop conditions), from the operational concept and system requirements. F.2.6 Structural model A structural model of the system is a representation that shows the arrangement of elements with respect to each other and where necessary shows the interfaces between elements and with external entities.
